name: Character Combat
description: Character combat is a game that is designed to give the user the unique experience of battling any type of superhero or villain. This application uses HTML5, Bulma CSS Framework, Javascript and jQuery.

name: Movie Mentor
description: Movie Mentor is a web application designed to help suggest TV Show/Movie titles to users based off of their personal preference and title selections. This application uses HTML5,  Javascript, HandlebarsJS Framework, jQuery and Node.js

name: CELP
description: Rate-A-Cop application designed to track police interaction in the Greater Philadelphia area. This application uses HTML5, Reactstrap CSS Framework, Javascript, Node.js, React.js and MongoDB

name: Weather Dashboard
description: An interactive and functioning live weather dashboard. This application uses HTML5, Bootstrap CSS Framework, Javascript, and jQuery.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: A simple calendar planning schedule that allows the user to both log and record their own notes for each hour of the 9-5 workday. This application uses concepts of HTML5, Bootstrap CSS Framework, Javascript, jQuery and Moment.js.

name: Employee Tracker
description: Employee tracker is an app that uses the previously mentioned languages. This is a CLI script for managing and tracking a company's employees using node, inquirer, and MySQL.

name: Workout Tracker
description: This application will help you track all of your exercises throughout the week. Whether it be resistance training or cardiovascular training- you will be able to record any event as well as add to existing workouts. This application uses HTML5, Bootstrap CSS Framework, Javascript, Node.js, and MongoDB
